result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: per order dated September 11, 2017, Appeal No. 2017XX1275CR, the deadline for Noblin to file a postconviction motion or a notice of appeal is extended though November 10, 2017.
JURY TRIAL (Afternoon Proceedings) Transcript commencing 04-12-2016 received and filed. CH Original transcript in case file 15CF005307 (90 Pages).
JURY TRIAL (Morning Proceedings) Transcript commencing 04-11-2016 received and filed. CH Original transcript in case file 15CF005307 (54 Pages).

Defendant Octavia R Noblin in court with attorney Scott Franklin Anderson.  Defendant Octavia R Noblin in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
cab
On state's motion, court ordered case dismissed and read-in for sentencing purposes.

The court will not be available on 06/03/2016.  ADA Lindsay and Attorney Scott Anderson contacted and cases will be heard on 06/02/2016 at 01:30 p.m. for status.
cab

Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court, defendant Octavia R Noblin not in court, in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
cab
Defendant is being sentenced on his felony case in this court.
Case adjourned for another status date in Branch 36.
  Status conference scheduled for June 3, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Octavia R Noblin in court with attorney Scott Franklin Anderson.  Defendant Octavia R Noblin in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
cab
Defendant's felony case, 15CF5307, is here for a jury trial.  This case will continue for status on 04/27/2016 at 08:30 a.m.

Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court, defendant Octavia R Noblin not in court, in custody. Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI
Defense Attorney waives defendant's appearance for todays date. Defense is unable to proceed on Case No. 15CF5307. Case adjourned for Status Conference in Br. 36.  Status conference scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Octavia R Noblin in court with attorney Scott Franklin Anderson.  Defendant Octavia R Noblin in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
cab
The case was set for status today with the defendant's felony case.
State informs the court that they are ready to proceed to trial.
Defense counsel is not ready to proceed and is requesting an adjournment of the trial.
State objects to any adjournment.  State also informs the court that they will be filing an amended information on his felony case.
Court grants the defense request for an adjournment but will not grant any further adjournments.
  Status conference scheduled for March 14, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court, defendant Octavia R Noblin not in court, in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
cab
Defendant's appearance waived for today's date.
Defense counsel is requesting another status date prior to the jury trial.  Additional discovery received today.
Court will not set another date but if the parties resolve the cases, they can contact the court for another date prior to trial in the defendant's felony case.
  Jury trial scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Octavia R Noblin in court with attorney Scott Franklin Anderson.  Defendant is in custody. Benjamin LIndsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
cab
Defense counsel is requesting a status date in Branch 36.
  Status conference scheduled for January 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Per Judge request, case transferred to Branch 36.

Attorney Scott D. Anderson in court, defendant Octavia R Noblin not in court, in custody.  Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CMC. Defendant currently has three cases, two scheduled in this branch, and one scheduled in branch 36. This court contacted branch 36, whom informed this court cases will remain in seperate courts currently due to different victims. Defense requests a Status Conference. Court grants defense request. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Status conference scheduled for January 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with: Porcha B; Felicia M.

Defendant Octavia R Noblin in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Octavia R Noblin in custody.  
Zachary A Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: sm  
All parties were informed that as of December 14, 2015, this case will be assigned to Judge Janet Protasiewicz, Branch 24 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Scheduling conference scheduled for December 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 100.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court.  Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case set for jury trial. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is a possible victim identifed, therefore, Court stays order of forfeiture with recompense to be determined at close of case.

Defendant Octavia R Noblin in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Final Pretrial held.  Case remains set for jury trial on 05-06-2015 in Branch 40.  State withdrew their offer to the defendant.  Court reminds defendant the no contact order remains in effect.

Defendant Octavia R Noblin in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Pretrial Conference held.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

02-04-2015

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Porcha B. or Felicia M.

Defendant Octavia R Noblin in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Octavia R Noblin in custody.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HP
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
